original_text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him. And he went into the Pharisee's house, and sat down to meat.
korean_text: 한 바리새인이 예수께 자기와 함께 잡수시기를 청하니 이에 바리새인의 집에 들어가 앉으셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: And one of the Pharisees desired him
that he would eat with him
And he went into the Pharisee's house
